pages.text: About This SiteBlank.About MeI’m a master student from Center for Future Media, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, under supervision of Prof. Song and Gao. My research interests lie in quantization for image retrieval, computer vision. I obtained my bachelor’s degree on Electrical Engineering and Auotmation in UESTC at year of 2017.Working knowledgeC# and .NET programmingpython and TensorflowBasic knowledgeJavaJavascript and front-endI’ve developed several apps on UWP (Universal Windows Platform) with C#. Including Aurora Music, which is the finalist of Design Innovator in Windows Developer Awards 2018. PublicationsDeep Recurrent Quantization for Generating Sequential Binary Codes. In IJCAI 2019, accepted. Jingkuan Song, Xiaosu Zhu, Lianli Gao, Xin-Shun Xu, Wu Liu, Heng Tao Shen. Paper, Code.Beyond Product Quantization: Deep Progressive Quantization for Image Retrieval. In IJCAI 2019, accepted. Lianli Gao, Xiaosu Zhu, Jingkuan Song, Zhou Zhao, Heng Tao Shen. Paper, Code.
